title: Cloud Bounding Boxes - CV 0.58
description: Cloud Bounding Boxes - CV 0.58In this kernel we will attempt to create bounding boxes instead of segmentation. Currently the CV is a low 0.58 but perhaps this kernel can be improved to score higher. There is a variable TRAIN_MODELS below. If you set this variable to False then you can load oof and preds from offline training and predicting. Do this to save your GPU quota. If you want to see the models train and predict, then turn GPU on and set variable TRAIN_MODELS to True.
